In England, in the seven days to 27 July, there were 171,754 new confirmed cases (305.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 July, there were 299,918 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 43% (128,164 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 August is 5,135,378 (9,123.6 cases per 100,000 population).
